from pyspark.sql.types import IntegerType, ArrayType, StructType, StructField
from pyspark.sql import Row
from pyspark.sql.functions import *
import json
from datetime import datetime
from notebookutils import mssparkutils

PipelineName = ""
PipelineRunID = ""
PipelineTriggerID = ""
PipelineTriggerName = ""
PipelineTriggerType = ""
PipelineTriggeredbyPipelineName = ""
PipelineTriggeredbyPipelineRunID = ""

# Define variables
horizon_table = "odw_standardised_db.aie_document_data"
spark_table_final = "odw_harmonised_db.aie_document_data"
primary_key = 'TEMP_PK'

# Initialize tracking variables
start_exec_time = datetime.now()
insert_count = 0
update_count = 0
delete_count = 0
error_message = ""

try:
    # Read and transform data from source
    logInfo(f"Reading data from {horizon_table}")
    results = spark.sql(f"""
                    SELECT DISTINCT 
                        MD5(
                            CONCAT(
                                COALESCE(CAST(documentId AS INTEGER), ''), 
                                COALESCE(filename, ''), 
                                COALESCE(CAST(version AS INTEGER), '')
                            )
                        ) AS {primary_key}
                        ,CAST(NULL AS LONG) AS AIEDocumentDataID
                        ,documentId
                        ,caseRef
                        ,documentReference
                        ,version
                        ,examinationRefNo
                        ,filename
                        ,originalFilename
                        ,size
                        ,mime
                        ,documentUri
                        ,path
                        ,virusCheckStatus
                        ,fileMD5
                        ,dateCreated
                        ,lastModified
                        ,caseType
                        ,documentStatus
                        ,redactedStatus
                        ,publishedStatus
                        ,datePublished
                        ,documentType
                        ,securityClassification
                        ,sourceSystem
                        ,origin
                        ,owner
                        ,author
                        ,representative
                        ,description
                        ,stage
                        ,filter1
                        ,filter2

                        ,"0" as Migrated
                        ,"Horizon" as ODTSourceSystem
                        ,NULL AS SourceSystemID
                        ,to_timestamp(expected_from)  AS IngestionDate
                        ,CAST(null as string) as ValidTo -- to avoid any null descrepancies
                        ,'' as RowID
                        ,'Y' as IsActive
                    FROM
                        {horizon_table} AS Doc
                    WHERE
                        expected_from = (SELECT MAX(expected_from) FROM {horizon_table})
                """)
        # Initial write to create temp table structure
    logInfo(f"Initial write to {spark_table_final}")
    results.write.format("delta").mode("Overwrite").option("overwriteSchema", "true").partitionBy("IsActive").saveAsTable(f"{spark_table_final}")
    
    # Create calculations view for internal IDs and IsActive flags
    logInfo("Creating calculations for internal IDs and IsActive flags")
    spark.sql(f"""
        CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW vw_aie_document_data_calculations_base
            AS
            SELECT  
                row_number() OVER(PARTITION BY {primary_key} ORDER BY IngestionDate DESC) AS ReverseOrderProcessed
                ,row_number() OVER(ORDER BY IngestionDate asc, {primary_key} asc) AS AIEDocumentDataID
                ,{primary_key}
                ,IngestionDate
                ,ValidTo
                ,'0' AS Migrated
                ,CASE row_number() OVER(PARTITION BY {primary_key} ORDER BY IngestionDate DESC)
                    WHEN 1 THEN
                        'Y'
                    ELSE
                        'N'
                END AS IsActive                
            FROM
                {spark_table_final}
        """)
    
    # Get calculated values for internal IDs
    df_calcs = spark.sql(f"""
                            SELECT
                                CurrentRow.AIEDocumentDataID
                                ,CurrentRow.{primary_key} 
                                ,CurrentRow.IngestionDate
                                ,COALESCE(NULLIF(CurrentRow.ValidTo,''), NextRow.IngestionDate) AS ValidTo
                                ,"0" AS Migrated
                                ,CurrentRow.IsActive
                            FROM
                                vw_aie_document_data_calculations_base AS CurrentRow
                                LEFT OUTER JOIN vw_aie_document_data_calculations_base AS NextRow
                                    ON CurrentRow.{primary_key} = NextRow.{primary_key}
                                    AND CurrentRow.ReverseOrderProcessed - 1 = NextRow.ReverseOrderProcessed
                                ORDER BY currentRow.ReverseOrderProcessed
                        """)
    
    df_calcs = df_calcs.withColumnRenamed(primary_key, f"temp_{primary_key}").withColumnRenamed("IngestionDate", "temp_IngestionDate")
    
    # Get final result set with all data and RowID
    results_final = spark.sql(f"""
                        SELECT DISTINCT 
                            {primary_key}
                            ,AIEDocumentDataID
                            ,documentId
                            ,caseRef
                            ,documentReference
                            ,version
                            ,examinationRefNo
                            ,filename
                            ,originalFilename
                            ,size
                            ,mime
                            ,documentUri
                            ,path
                            ,virusCheckStatus
                            ,fileMD5
                            ,dateCreated
                            ,lastModified
                            ,caseType
                            ,documentStatus
                            ,redactedStatus
                            ,publishedStatus
                            ,datePublished
                            ,documentType
                            ,securityClassification
                            ,sourceSystem
                            ,origin
                            ,owner
                            ,author
                            ,representative
                            ,description
                            ,stage
                            ,filter1
                            ,filter2
                            ,Migrated
                            ,ODTSourceSystem
                            ,IngestionDate
                            ,ValidTo
                            ,MD5(CONCAT(
                                    IFNULL(AIEDocumentDataID, '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(documentId,'.')
                                    ,IFNULL(caseRef,'.')
                                    ,IFNULL(documentReference,'.')
                                    ,IFNULL(version,'.')
                                    ,IFNULL(examinationRefno,'.')
                                    ,IFNULL(filename,'.')
                                    ,IFNULL(originalFilename,'.')
                                    ,IFNULL(size,'.')
                                    ,IFNULL(mime,'.')
                                    ,IFNULL(documentUri,'.')
                                    ,IFNULL(path,'.')
                                    ,IFNULL(virusCheckStatus,'.')
                                    ,IFNULL(fileMD5,'.')
                                    ,IFNULL(dateCreated,'.')
                                    ,IFNULL(lastModified,'.')
                                    ,IFNULL(caseType,'.')
                                    ,IFNULL(documentStatus,'.')
                                    ,IFNULL(redactedStatus,'.')
                                    ,IFNULL(publishedStatus,'.')
                                    ,IFNULL(datePublished,'.')
                                    ,IFNULL(documentType,'.')
                                    ,IFNULL(securityClassification,'.')
                                    ,IFNULL(sourceSystem,'.')
                                    ,IFNULL(origin,'.')
                                    ,IFNULL(owner,'.')
                                    ,IFNULL(author,'.')
                                    ,IFNULL(representative,'.')
                                    ,IFNULL(description,'.')
                                    ,IFNULL(stage	,'.')
                                    ,IFNULL(filter1,'.')
                                    ,IFNULL(filter2,'.')
                                    ,IFNULL(publishedStatus, '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(Migrated, '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(ODTSourceSystem, '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(IngestionDate, '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(ValidTo, '.')
                                )
                            ) AS RowID
                            ,IsActive
                        FROM 
                            {spark_table_final}
                    """)
    
    # Prepare columns and join with calculations
    columns = results_final.columns
    results_clean = results_final.drop("AIEDocumentDataID", "ValidTo", "Migrated", "IsActive")
    
    # Final merge and deduplication
    logInfo(f"Merging and de-duplicating data")
    final_df = results_clean.join(df_calcs, (df_calcs[f"temp_{primary_key}"] == results_clean[primary_key]) & (df_calcs["temp_IngestionDate"] == results_clean["IngestionDate"])).select(columns)
    final_df = final_df.drop(primary_key).drop_duplicates()
    
    # Get record counts
    insert_count = final_df.count()
    
    # Final write
    logInfo(f"Writing final data to {spark_table_final}")
    final_df.write.format("delta").mode("Overwrite").option("overwriteSchema", "true").partitionBy("IsActive").saveAsTable(f"{spark_table_final}")
    
    end_exec_time = datetime.now()
    logInfo(f"Successfully processed {spark_table_final} with {insert_count} records")
    
    # Add successful result to logger
    duration_seconds = (end_exec_time - start_exec_time).total_seconds()
    
    activity_type = f"{mssparkutils.runtime.context['currentNotebookName']} Notebook"
    stage = "Success"
    status_message = (
        f"Successfully loaded data into {spark_table_final} table"        
    )
    status_code = "200"
    log_telemetry_and_exit(
        stage,
        start_exec_time,
        end_exec_time,
        error_message,
        spark_table_final,
        insert_count,
        update_count,
        delete_count,
        PipelineName,
        PipelineRunID,
        PipelineTriggerID,
        PipelineTriggerName,
        PipelineTriggerType,
        PipelineTriggeredbyPipelineName,
        PipelineTriggeredbyPipelineRunID,
        activity_type,
        duration_seconds,
        status_message,
        status_code
    )
    
except Exception as e:
    # Handle errors with proper logging
    logError(f"Error processing {spark_table_final}: {e}")
    error_message = format_error_message(e, max_length=800)
    
    end_exec_time = datetime.now()
    duration_seconds = (end_exec_time - start_exec_time).total_seconds()
    
    activity_type = f"{mssparkutils.runtime.context['currentNotebookName']} Notebook"
    stage = "Failed"
    status_message = (
        f"Failed to load data from {spark_table_final} table"
    )

    status_code = "500"    
    log_telemetry_and_exit(
        stage,
        start_exec_time,
        end_exec_time,
        error_message,
        f"odw_standardised_db.{spark_table_final}",
        insert_count,
        update_count,
        delete_count,
        PipelineName,
        PipelineRunID,
        PipelineTriggerID,
        PipelineTriggerName,
        PipelineTriggerType,
        PipelineTriggeredbyPipelineName,
        PipelineTriggeredbyPipelineRunID,
        activity_type,
        duration_seconds,
        status_message,
        status_code
    )
